Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.27271216]Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcuss aureus (MIC=25 μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=6.25 μM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=3.13 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli (MIC=12.5 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=12.5 μM), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC=25 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.27271216] 10% hemolysis at 20 μM , 15% hemolysis at 40 μM , 20% hemolysis at 60 μM , 30% hemolysis at 80 μM , 35% hemolysis at 100 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.27271216] In L929 cells, the cell viability is 85%, 68%, 21% and 6.6% at peptide concentrations of 6.25, 12.5, 25 and 50 μM.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Design of an α-helical antimicrobial peptide with improved cell selective and potent anti-biofilm activity
Literature.Author: Shi-KunZhang, Jin-wen Song, FengGong, Su-Bo Li, Hong-Yu Chang, Hui-MinXie, Hong-WeiGao, Ying-XiaTan & Shou-Ping Ji
